description:
Poot No. 1, the fart-powered robot that Grandpa invented, has made headlines overseas, so Grandpa begins to build Poot No. 2, a rocket-type. He believes that if Poot No. 2 can find a habitable planet, the problem of overpopulation will be solved! The power of farts will save the planet!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Farts Will Save the World! Poot No. 2?!
Onara wa Chikyuu o Sukuu, Puu 2 Gou!?
オナラは地球を救う, プー2号!?
